AgentOutputArtifact.description:
Standard container for all Sub-Agent outputs.

This structure implements a three-tier data architecture:
- L1 (summary): Message bubble text (<500 chars) - Always present
- L2 (preview): Hot data for immediate UI rendering (<1KB) - Optional
- L3 (reference): Cold data pointer for async loading - Optional

This ensures efficient state management by avoiding large data duplication
in LangGraph checkpoints.

preview.description: L2: Hot data for immediate UI rendering (<1KB). Generated by Mapper from State.
preview.title: Preview

reference.description: L3: Cold data pointer for async loading. Points to Artifact Store.

summary.description: L1: Short summary for message bubble (<500 chars)
summary.title: Summary

AgentOutputArtifact.title: AgentOutputArtifact

ArtifactReference.description:
L3 冷數據指針 (Cold Data Pointer)

Points to large artifacts stored in the Artifact Store.
Frontend can fetch these asynchronously via the download_url.

artifact_id.description: UUID of the artifact in the store
artifact_id.title: Artifact Id

download_url.description: API endpoint to fetch the artifact (e.g., /api/artifacts/{id})
download_url.title: Download Url

ArtifactReference.title: ArtifactReference

reason.default: Multiple tickers found or ambiguity detected.
reason.title: Reason

company_name.description: The name of the company or ticker mentioned by the user.
company_name.title: Company Name

is_valuation_request.description: Whether the user is asking for a financial valuation (default: True).
is_valuation_request.title: Is Valuation Request

ticker.description: The stock ticker if explicitly mentioned.
ticker.title: Ticker

info.description: Pure FastAPI implementation for FinGraph Valuation Agent (Path B)
info.title: Neuro-Symbolic Valuation Engine API
